channel.title: good-sentences on tsthght's blog
channel.description: Recent content in good-sentences on tsthght's blog

item.title: 2022 21th Weeks
item.description: from 《blackhole》@Netflix I thought there are very interesting things in the universe to be explored. You really need to be above the atmosphere to see through to the emptiness space. We’re gonna take the first picture of a blackhole. It’s like a vortex in the universe in space and time. The darkest object we can imagine mathematically and fundamentally. That means that the basic nature of the universe is just random.

item.title: 2022 20th Good Sentences
item.description: from 《a perfect pairing》@Netflix Let’s go a lot of bold and a little crazy. 让我们冒进疯狂一点吧。 Uh, right. That’s why you’re snooping around her house. 是哦，所以你在她家里窥探？ Charm doesn’t work on me. 卖萌对我不管用。 Australian sun shows no mercy. I learned the hard way. Once bitten, twice shy. 吃过苦头才明白，一朝被蛇咬，十年怕井绳。 I have no word but ‘wow’.

item.title: 2022-19th Good Sentences
item.description: from 《The surgeon’s cut》@Netflix I wanted to devote my life towards understanding how we can save the baby in situations where the baby would otherwise die. He has been a pioneer. From my perspective, that is a very simple gesture which engages them. We are undertaking the procedure together. You know, I can’t wait to hold them and be a dad.
